title: Remove old vanilla HTML/CSS/JS static files
description:
Remove legacy static files that are replaced by Lit components:

Files to remove (after verifying new UI works):
- Old index.html (replaced by Vite-built version)
- Old CSS files (styles moved to components)
- Old JavaScript files (logic moved to TypeScript)

Steps:
1. List all files in old static directory
2. Verify each is replaced by new implementation
3. Remove old files
4. Update any references in Go code
5. Run full build to verify nothing breaks

Test: go build ./cmd/tk && ./tk board
acceptance_criteria: Old files removed, Go build succeeds, tk board serves new UI correctly
